title: Break Me
description: I’m falling in love. When I’m with him I feel free and vibrant. It feels safe. It feels right. It’s a lie.When Agnes Bright agreed to a two month trial period as David Lake’s submissive lover, she intended to end her marriage and tell him everything. But the longer her divorce papers remain unsigned and her husband remains in the shadows, the harder it becomes to admit that she is not who she claimed to be that first night at the Grotto. Will the truth set her free or burn her new life to ashes?The three book Absolution series is meant to be read in order:Bend Me (Absolution part one)Break Me (Absolution part two)Bind Me (Absolution part three)Be advised that this novel contains BDSM content, dark elements, and mature subject matter. Due to explicit sexual content and adult language this novel is recommend for readers 18 and older.
author: Sophia Scarlet
